product_name: Oboz Madison Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring a women-specific fit, the waterproof Oboz Madison Mid Hiking Boots provide solid traction and complete waterproof protection whether you're hiking along jagged peaks or flowing streams. Nubuck and suede leather uppers freature BDry waterproof, breathable membranes to keep your feet dry on wet trails. Dual-density EVA midsoles provide cushioning. Nylon shanks add support for long days on your feet. High-traction carbon lugs provide solid grip for the uphills and braking for the downhills. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring a women-specific fit, the waterproof Oboz Madison Mid Hiking Boots provide solid traction and complete waterproof protection whether you're hiking along jagged peaks or flowing streams.
